titles.title: A bill to require the United States Trade Representative to initiate an investigation of unfair trade barriers maintained by Japan against United States construction services.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/23/1987--Introduced. Requires the United States Trade Representative to initiate an investigation under the Trade Act of 1972 regarding unfair trade barriers of entities owned, controlled, and financed by the Government of Japan against U.S. architectural, engineering, construction, and consulting services.
